name: profile
body:
### Muthukumar Rajendran.
Hooked into ASP.NET MVC and Node (MEAN) full stack web development.

* Highly motivated and skilled software engineer, with 5+ years background in diverse facets of .NET development, analysis, design, development, and execution of business applications.

* Designed and developed .NET smart client & web applications with intuitive GUI design

* Extensive programming experience using ASP.NET 4.0, MVC,Mean Stack (Mongo DB, Express, AngularJS and Node.js), WPF/Silverlight, Entity Framework, LINQ, HTML5 and CSS3

* Developed WCF services, REST services, OData services and windows service applications in .NET, MS SQL Server & Oracle

* End to end design to deployment experience.

* Good knowledge in OOAD, Design Principles, Design Patterns and Architectural Patterns

* Excellent communication skills with strong background working directly with coworkers and clientele to identify business objectives and establish requirements.
